ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Wooho Absor's a Bard!!  Absor's a Bard!!  Absor's a Bard!!! *does a little dance*
ygData.msgSnippet: Eeeeek but he is a half breed, which means he has no fashion sense lol Rokenn, The always fashionable wood elven bard :)
ygData.messageBody:
Eeeeek but he is a half breed, which means he has no fashion sense lol

Rokenn, The always fashionable wood elven bard :)

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Cyr, Thierry [mailto:thierry.cyr@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, October 17, 2000 2:43 PM
> To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
> Subject: [eqbards] Wooho Absor's a Bard!! Absor's a Bard!! Absor's a
> Bard!!! *does a little dance*
>
>
> http://www.eqx.simplenet.com/Issue50/musings.htm
>
> Weee i hope this helps us out, Absor (gordo's replacement)
> seems to be a
> bard. Could it be we might have someone represent us that has
> a clue now?
>
> "Many of my people brag that they have been granted the best
> traits of their
> parents. Perhaps. But we also bear the burden of that
> heritage. Neither
> Humans nor Elves love us, yet we must find our way in their
> society. Often
> enough this isolation breaks our spirit. We have never found our own
> society, and therefore can find no place to call home. But
> for some, myself
> included, this has been a blessing. We are not restricted by racial
> boundaries, and have the pleasure to claim all of Norrath as home."
>
> - Absor, Half-Elven Bard
>
>
> Forgive my happiness, i know bards aren't suppose to be all cheery and
> affect their entourage in a positive way.
>
> Minkin
> Sol Ro
